com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Class NullPersistence

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache.Persistence
      • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache.NullPersistence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Business.InputStreamer<java.lang.String,Persistence.PersistenceException>, Business.IOStreamer<java.lang.String,Persistence.PersistenceException>, Business.OutputStreamer<java.lang.String,Persistence.PersistenceException>

    public class NullPersistence
extends Persistence
    An implementation of persistence which stores nothing.

    This class is helpful when a Persistence instance is required, but that no data should be actually persisted.

    Since:
    2011.08.04
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier

      • computePolicyAndCleanUpInstance

        protected void computePolicyAndCleanUpInstance()
                                        throws Persistence.PersistenceException
        Description copied from class: Persistence
        Is responsible for invoking the Persistence.computeCleanUpPolicy() and then, if the returned value not null, invoke the Persistence.cleanUpInstance(CleanUpPolicy) method.
        Specified by:
        computePolicyAndCleanUpInstance in class Persistence
        Throws:
        Persistence.PersistenceException - if something goes wrong during the Persistence.cleanUpInstance(CleanUpPolicy) method execution

      • computeCleanUpPolicy

        protected <CleanUpPolicyClass extends Persistence.CleanUpPolicy> CleanUpPolicyClass computeCleanUpPolicy()
        Description copied from class: Persistence
        Enables to define the way the persistence cache clean up is performed.

        This method is supposed to be invoked by the #cleanUpInstance() method, when it attempts to determine the Persistence.CleanUpPolicy to use.

        Specified by:
        computeCleanUpPolicy in class Persistence
        Returns:
        a clean-up policy ; may be null, and in that case, the Persistence.computePolicyAndCleanUpInstance() should not run the Persistence.cleanUpInstance(CleanUpPolicy) method

      • cleanUpInstance

        protected <CleanUpPolicyClass extends Persistence.CleanUpPolicy> void cleanUpInstance(CleanUpPolicyClass cleanUpPolicy)
                        throws Persistence.PersistenceException
        Description copied from class: Persistence
        Cleans-up the persistence.

        This will remove persistent entries depending on the provided cleanUpPolicy.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        cleanUpPolicy - the policy to use for cleaning up the instance

        Persistence.PersistenceException

      • clearInstance

        protected void clearInstance()
                      throws Persistence.PersistenceException
        Description copied from class: Persistence
        Empties the persistence.

        Once called, the persistence storage will be emptied, but the instance can keep on being used as is.

        Specified by:
        clearInstance in class Persistence
        Throws:
        Persistence.PersistenceException
        See Also:
        Persistence.clear()

      • closeInstance

        protected void closeInstance()
                      throws Persistence.PersistenceException
        Description copied from class: Persistence
        Closes the persistence.

        Once called, the persistence will need to be initialized again, before being used.

        Specified by:
        closeInstance in class Persistence
        Throws:
        Persistence.PersistenceException
        See Also:
        Persistence.close()

      • writeInputStreamInstance

        protected java.io.InputStream writeInputStreamInstance(java.lang.String uri,
                                           Business.InputAtom inputAtom,
                                           boolean returnStream)
                                                throws Persistence.PersistenceException
        Description copied from class: Persistence
        Is responsible for performing the #writeInputStream() method job.
        Specified by:
        writeInputStreamInstance in class Persistence
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI which identifies the stream to persist
        inputAtom - the binary form of the data to store for the provided URI
        returnStream - if set true, a valid InputStream corresponding to the provided Business.InputAtom#inputStream must be returned ; if set to false, null must be returned
        Returns:
        null if returnStream is set to false ; if returnStream is set to true, an input stream which holds the same data as the provided inputAtom Business.InputAtom#inputStream
        Throws:
        Persistence.PersistenceException - if a problem occurred while writing the data
        See Also:
        #writeInputStream()
